segments.text: Really ? My name is Gretchen Hammer . What is your name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My name is Phillip Hammer . I think we are related . Who is your dad ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Jacob Hammer . He is originally from Holland .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's my uncle . You're my cousin ! Hi cousin !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's really a small world , isn't it ! The Hammer family isn't very big .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It really is . Do you have time to eat dinner and catch up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I always make time for family .
segments.speaker: S2
